column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Asami says : " What are you doing here ? "
#Text=Lin says : " We have a reason to believe that there 's a factory hidden below the mansion . "
#Text=Asami says : " I think I would 've noticed if there were a factory underneath my house .
#Text=" Asami says : " In his workshop , behind the house .
#Text=" Asami says : " Dad ?
#Text=Hello ?
#Text=" Officer says : " Chief , the estate 's been secured .
#Text=No one has left the workshop since we arrived .
#Text=" Lin says : " Perhaps we just could n't see him leaving .
#Text=" Lin says : " There 's a tunnel beneath the workshop running deep into the mountainside .
#Text=" Asami says : " What ?
#Text=There 's no tunnel .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Do you think your dad knows about this tunnel ?
#Text=" Asami says : " I do n't understand .
#Text=There must be an explanation .
#Text=" Korra says : " Maybe you do n't know everything about your father .
#Text=I 'm sorry .
#Text=" Lin says : " Officers , into the tunnel .
#Text=Be cautious .
#Text=Uh - uh , you three stay up here .
#Text=Officer Song , keep an eye on them .
#Text=" Lin says : " Not your average backyard workshop .
#Text=" Korra says : " And I 'm guessing those are the new weapons .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Hiroshi was lying all right , but where is he ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " What was that ?
#Text=" Mako says : " We need to get down there and see what 's going on .
#Text=" Song says : " Absolutely not .
#Text=You 're staying put until the chief comes back .
#Text=" Mako says : " All right , we 'll stay put .
#Text=But could we wait outside or something ?
#Text=It 's so dusty in this workshop .
#Text=" Song says : " No !
#Text=We 're waiting right here !
#Text=" Mako says : " Okay , but do n't blame me if I start sne - if I start sn - sn - sneez - " Song says : " What 's your problem , bub ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm about to - Sorry pal , we know you were just doing your job .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah , just stay put until the chief comes back .
#Text=That 's sounds very familiar does n't it , why ?
#Text=Because you said it .
#Text=" Mako says : " Asami , you should stay here .
#Text=We 'll check it out .
#Text=" Asami says : " I have to find out the truth about my father .
#Text=" Mako says : " I understand .
#Text=That 's why I 'm going down , to find out for you .
#Text=Please .
#Text=" Asami says : " All right .
#Text=Be careful .
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " I 'm afraid you wo n't be able to metalbend that wall , Chief Beifong .
#Text=It 's solid platinum .
#Text=My mecha tanks are platinum as well .
#Text=Not even your renowned mother could bend a metal so pure .
#Text=" Korra says : " Hiroshi , I knew you were a lying , no good Equalist !
#Text=Come out here and - " Hiroshi Sato says : " And do what , young Avatar ?
#Text=Face the wrath of your bending ?
#Text=No .
#Text=I think I 'll fight from inside here where my odds are a little more ... equal .
#Text=" Lin says : " That source was a set - up !
#Text=You lured us down here !
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " Guilty as charged .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Korra !
#Text="
